about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a world of chaos and hopelessness with a detective named Thomas. This city is his home, but now it looks more like a minefield. Drugs, corruption, murders - all this has become commonplace.

Thomas was a defender of the city, but after a high-profile incident, he was fired from the police. Now he has founded his own detective agency and is trying to regain his former glory. But time goes by, and there are still no customers. Forgotten and depressed, Thomas finds solace in a bottle of alcohol.

However, Thomas has a chance to regain his good name. He will have to solve a chain of mysterious murders related to drug cartels and politicians. Will he be able to become the hero that the city has been waiting for for so long?

Features of the game:

- An exciting story with unexpected twists.
- A huge city with many neighborhoods and locations.
- A complex system of investigations that requires care and logical thinking.
- The ability to interact with different characters, each of which has its own secrets and motives.
- The atmosphere of fear and despair prevailing in the city, which will accompany you throughout the entire passage.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional graphic violence & gore, some strong bad language and infrequent frontal nudity.

short_description: You play as a former policeman who founded a private detective agency. Investigate a chain of mysterious murders, plunge into the world of crime, gain former glory, restore your good name. An exciting storyline, explore the city, a lot of characters, an atmosphere of fear and hopelessness.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
